text: arau e'idarae bahuto musbaraikara drstita sihamtara sbaraikasakale sihamtara santanasakalaka hatya karaa sobhaniya karai diche, yate sihamtaka dhbansa karaiba parae arau sihamtara ocarata sihamtara dbinaka sansayapurna karaiba parae; arau allahe iccha karaile sihamte e'ibora nakarailehemtena. Gatike sihamtaka sihamtara micha ratana laiye thakiba diya
